description: Displays the tags associated with a CloudWatch resource. Currently, alarms and Contributor Insights rules support tagging.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The ARN of the CloudWatch resource that you want to view tags for. The ARN format of an alarm is arn:aws:cloudwatch:Region:account-id:alarm:alarm-name The ARN format of a Contributor Insights rule is arn:aws:cloudwatch:Region:account-id:insight-rule/insight-rule-name For more information about ARN format, see Resource Types Defined by Amazon CloudWatch in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The list of tag keys and values associated with the resource you specified.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A string that you can use to assign a value. The combination of tag keys and values can help you organize and categorize your resources.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the specified tag key.
